pages.text: this section has pages for various other blocks in QMD that have functions
An radioisotope thermoelectric generator that uses Strontium 90 a common nuclear waste.

pages.title: Super Alloy Turbine Blade
pages.text: A turbine blade made of super alloy for high efficiencies.

pages.title: Hafnium Neutron Shield
pages.text: A fission shield for reactors made of hafnium for higher efficiencies.

pages.title: Discharge Lamps
pages.text: A decorative light that can be turned off with redstone. They come in different colors depending on the element inside.

pages.title: Radioluminescent Paint
pages.text: A decorative light layer that comes in 3 different colors! It can be placed on any side of a block. It also has the benefit that it is radioactive.

A block that outputs any particle stack. It has a gui to select the type amount energy and focus of a stack. Note that the name is the registry name of the particle not the localized name. e.g antisigma_plus instead of Anti-Sigma +$(br)The registry names can be found in the $(l:particles/list)particle list section$(/l).
